review.author: Jane Doe
review.text: John is an amazing trainer! He really knows his stuff and helped me achieve my fitness goals.

review.author: John Lee
review.text: Emily is an incredible yoga teacher! Her classes are challenging but also very relaxing.

review.author: Sarah Johnson
review.text: Alex is the best CrossFit coach I've ever had! He pushes me to my limits but also keeps things fun and motivating.

review.author: Amy Chen
review.text: David is a fantastic Pilates instructor! He really understands the body and how to get the most out of each exercise.
